name: @cboulanger/abbyy-cloud-ocr
description: NodeJS client and CLI to interact with the ABBYY Cloud OCR service

scripts.test: tsc run.ts && diff test/test.txt -bB $(ts-node run.ts process -F -l German -e txt test/test.pdf)
scripts.test-debug: tsc run.ts && ts-node run.ts process -F -l German -d -e txtUnstructured,pdfa,docx test/test.pdf
scripts.publish-patch: npm run tsc && npm version patch && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish-minor: npm run tsc && npm version minor && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish-major: npm run tsc && npm version major && npm publish --access public

author: Christian Boulanger (@cboulanger) infoy@bibliograph.org
